acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.description: Performing agile maneuvers, balancing, tumbling, and reducing fall damage.

appraisal.name: Appraisal
appraisal.description: Determining the value, authenticity, and properties of items, artifacts, or goods.

arcana.name: Arcana
arcana.description: Knowledge about magic, magical traditions, spells, arcane symbols, and supernatural effects.

athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: Performing physical activities like running, jumping, swimming, climbing, and feats of raw power.

crafting_basic.name: Crafting (Basic)
crafting_basic.description: Basic ability to create, repair, or modify simple items and equipment.

crafting_metallurgy.name: Crafting (Metallurgy)
crafting_metallurgy.description: Specialized skill in working with metals, including forging, smithing, and understanding alloys.

deception.name: Deception
deception.description: Misleading others through lies, trickery, disguises, and manipulation of truth.

defensive_combat.name: Defensive Combat
defensive_combat.description: Mastery of self-preservation and defensive maneuvers.

diplomacy.name: Diplomacy
diplomacy.description: Influencing others through negotiation, tact, and understanding of social etiquette.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Avoiding attacks and obstacles through quick movements.

endurance.name: Endurance
endurance.description: Withstanding prolonged physical exertion, fatigue, hardship, and resisting exhaustion.

history.name: History
history.description: Knowledge of past events, civilizations, historical figures, and the study of recorded history.

history_oral.name: History (Oral)
history_oral.description: Knowledge of past events, legends, and traditions passed down verbally, common in cultures without extensive written records.

insight.name: Insight
insight.description: Discerning true intentions, detecting lies, sensing emotions, and understanding underlying truths or motives.

insight_probability.name: Insight (Probability)
insight_probability.description: Intuitive understanding of chance, luck, predicting random outcomes, and sensing probability currents.

insight_risk_assessment.name: Insight (Risk Assessment)
insight_risk_assessment.description: Specifically assessing potential dangers, evaluating probabilities of failure/success, and calculating risks in various situations.

intimidation.name: Intimidation
intimidation.description: Influencing others through threats, fear, force of presence, or hostile actions.

investigation.name: Investigation
investigation.description: Finding clues, deducing information, examining details, and solving mysteries or puzzles.

mathematics_basic.name: Mathematics (Basic)
mathematics_basic.description: Basic understanding and application of mathematical principles, logic, and calculations.

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.description: Diagnosing illnesses, treating wounds, administering first aid, and knowledge of remedies.

nature.name: Nature
nature.description: Knowledge about flora, fauna, weather, natural terrain, and survival in natural environments.

navigation.name: Navigation
navigation.description: Finding one's way through various terrains, using maps, stars, or natural signs.

perception.name: Perception
perception.description: Noticing details in your surroundings, detecting hidden objects, and general awareness of your environment.

persuasion.name: Persuasion
persuasion.description: Convincing others through reasoning, charm, debate, or emotional appeals.

planar_lore.name: Planar Lore
planar_lore.description: General knowledge about the different planes of existence, their properties, inhabitants, and planar travel.

planar_lore_basic.name: Planar Lore (Basic)
planar_lore_basic.description: Basic understanding of the different planes of existence, their interactions, and common phenomena.

planar_lore_rumors.name: Planar Lore (Rumors)
planar_lore_rumors.description: Knowledge of hearsay, gossip, unverified information, and local legends about the planes.

religion.name: Religion
religion.description: Knowledge about deities, religious rites, holy symbols, mythology, and theological matters. Also represents strength of faith.

spell_attack.name: Spell Attack
spell_attack.description: Magical attacks using spells or arcane abilities.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Moving silently, avoiding detection, and hiding effectively.

streetwise_harmonia.name: Streetwise (Harmonia)
streetwise_harmonia.description: Knowledge of the streets, local customs, influential figures, and underworld of Harmonia.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: Thriving in the wild by tracking, foraging, finding shelter, and navigating harsh environments.

unarmed_attack.name: Unarmed Attack
unarmed_attack.description: Combat attacks without weapons, such as punches and kicks.

resonance_sensing.name: Resonance Sensing
resonance_sensing.description: Sensing upcoming Resonance Events or weak planar boundaries; helps finding hidden paths in bleed zones.

ash_walking.name: Ash Walking
ash_walking.description: Moving silently specifically over brittle/noisy terrain (ash, glass). Stealth bonus in Ashen/Crystalline biomes.

facet_logic.name: Facet Logic
facet_logic.description: Deciphering geometric puzzles; required for advanced Facet Magic spells. The mathematical magic of the Consortium.

green_speech.name: Green Speech
green_speech.description: Non-verbal communication with flora. Gathering info from plants; calming aggressive plant-beasts.

echo_navigation.name: Echo Navigation
echo_navigation.description: Navigating the shifting, non-Euclidean layouts of the Ghost Markets. Reduces travel time; prevents getting lost.

scavenging.name: Scavenging
scavenging.description: Finding use in the decay of the Shattering. Higher loot drop rates; finding food in wastelands.

planar_anchoring.name: Planar Anchoring
planar_anchoring.description: Resisting the mental drift caused by plane-shifting. Saving throw vs. planar displacement or madness.

attunement.name: Attunement
attunement.description: Physically adapting body rhythm to the current plane. Reduces stamina drain in hostile planar environments.

storm_riding.name: Storm Riding
storm_riding.description: Moving with the chaotic flow of probability. Initiative bonus; traverse hazardous weather effects safely.

oral_history.name: Oral History
oral_history.description: Remembering knowledge that cannot be written down. Unlock lore hints without books; improves reputation with nomadic tribes.

barter.name: Barter
barter.description: The universal language of the Nexus. Better prices; unlocking 'special stock' in shops.

tinkering.name: Tinkering
tinkering.description: Maintaining gear in a world where physics glitch. Repair equipment; craft improvised traps.

first_aid.name: First Aid
first_aid.description: Non-magical healing. Stop bleeding; stabilize dying allies without mana.

focus.name: Focus
focus.description: Maintaining spell concentration amidst chaos. Interrupt resistance; mental defense.
